dmca.title: [ABUSE] torrent site
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, March 14, 2006 11:41 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] torrent site

This message was received at abuse@theplanet.com on Tuesday, March 14, 2006
at
09:47:06 and concerns a matter for which responsibility is delegated to your
team. The message and headers follow.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

SUBJECT:
[ABUSE] torrent site

MESSAGE BODY:
on your servers there is a buryed torrent site this is a copyright
infringement of the woste kind  here is the url of the site
www.safelyunderground.com/site2/index.php

here is the ht access code

goodlookingout
GL0702hf910yu

some times you must put that in twice and not copy and paste it !

the FIB are going to be informed i thought you would like the chance to drop
it before then !

the account is for a guy that calls him self PlanetMaster (gary) he owns the
hosting site on your servers www.visionplateau.com
